title: feat: add ElevenLabs Scribe v2 STT
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Crystal clear hearing
gist.blurb: The hive just got a hearing upgrade with ElevenLabs Scribe v2. Now we can transcribe every buzz with perfect accuracy.
gist.summary: Integrated ElevenLabs Scribe v2 model for high-accuracy speech-to-text transcription with full OpenAI API compatibility.
gist.impact: Developers can now access premium transcription quality by simply switching the model parameter to 'scribe'.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a diligent scribe, translating sound into text. Represents the new Scribe v2 model. Key elements: headphones, quill, scroll, sound waves transforming into text.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing vintage headphones and writing with a quill on a floating pixelated scroll. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Floating musical notes turning into text characters. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SCRIBE V2'. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing vintage headphones and writing with a quill on a floating pixelated scroll. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Floating musical notes turning into text characters. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley.
